name: A Hard Time DEMO
description:
just a Demo version of "A Hard Time"

full version - https://levi-henry.itch.io/a-very-hard-time-boii

Coming out in 2022

Instructions:

press space to jump

press p to enter in-game menu

press backspace to leave in_game menu

f11 to enter fullscreen

f12 to leave fullscreen

stuff about the objects are in the game!
